name: limbo
description: Token Preseeding Smart Contracts for Behodler.

scripts.build:debug: sudo rm -rf build/ && truffle build && yarn typechain
scripts.docker:install: rm -rf node_modules/* && touch yarn.lock && rm yarn.lock && docker-compose up install
scripts.scripts:setup: sudo npx hardhat run --network localhost scripts/test-setup.ts
scripts.scripts:addresses: sudo npx hardhat run --network localhost scripts/collect-addresses.ts
scripts.update:ui: node -e 'setTimeout(()=>{},15000)' && yarn scripts:addresses && yarn scripts:setup && yarn update:contracts && rm -rf ../LimboUI/src/constants/contracts && cp -R build/contracts/ ../LimboUI/src/constants/contracts
